To estimate ratios of market values (equ: Number of firms in the industry grouping.
Aggregated market capitalization divided by aggregated book value of equity, across all firms in the group.
Unnamed: 2: Measure of market value of equity, relative to accounting value of equity

To estimate ratios of market values (equ: Aggregate net income divided by aggregated book value of equity, across companies in group.
Unnamed: 2: Measure of returns earned on projects, to equity investors

To estimate ratios of market values (equ: Aggregated enterprise value divided by aggregated invested capital, across all firms in the group. (EV = Market Cap + Debt - Cash, Invested Capital = BV of equity + Debt - Cash)
Unnamed: 2: Measure of market value of firm,  relative to accounting value of firm

To estimate ratios of market values (equ: Aggregate after-tax operating income divided by aggregated invested capital, across companies in group.
Unnamed: 2: Measure of returns earned on projects, to all claim holders
